U-tGhuGt-KC3Z9TCIKOB0w.text: Service was great! But I can't say the about food. Sliders had a wierd taste. Boneless wings had no flavor at all! Medium wings werent spicy at all! Unfortunately we will not return to eat here. Maybe to go have a beer and watch a game.

6X9snten7Jv0OTYazZnYpA.text: this hooters is awesome. stellar service, the girls are super kind and attentive, and the managers are always making sure the guests are happy. the wings are amazing, as are the burgers!! highly recommend.

XcBGoJMETGuEQ2eiuQKUjQ.text: Food was OK... But our server Keena made the night. They have so many tvs I could barely look down. I also like how the kitchen is visible to the public.

t3whVRDgtKNUEakSuSjUsA.text: You will be hard pressed to find a better burger.  The menu has changed recently, I recommend over other similar sports bars.  ThIs location and the rock hill location really care that you get good food and service. You will get a hand pressed half pound burger here, not a frozen thin excuse for a burger that other places give you.  If you don't like what you get tell them, they will make it good, just be nice and honest with them.  They do listen to the customers!  I am not alone there are many regulars I see each time I visit.

0p1aJH4BHqYX-F-hmD21GQ.text: My husband and I ate here for lunch while my car was being serviced at the Volkswagen dealer across the street. It was 11:30am, prime lunchtime, and it took forever to get our food. There was only 3 other tables in the entire place and it took over 30 minutes for our 2 sandwiches to make it to our table. The waitress never checked on us or apologized. Once the food came it was underwhelming to say the least. The curly fries were the best thing on my plate. The chicken was dry and the bun was way to large for the chicken that was on it. Next time I get my car serviced I'll visit the Chick-Fil-A instead.

N_teqM5b-8-0qFS0fDH1hw.text: bad service, the manager lacks education, we miss the place without reason

GrX8bH3UJdOGgIMOhR3PLQ.text: The great thing about my visit was the VERY cold beer.  The food was alright.  If I am going to splurge on wings, I have better options around here.

gpXQkCYB5sUb5BU790dVKw.text: Had lunch on 6/17. Excellent service.  Renee, the Hooters girl serving me was courteous, friendly, and very attentive. The wings were excellent and fresh. Very happy with my visit. It was my birthday and the entire Hooters staff gathered around me and sang a catchy Hooters happy birthday song.  It was pretty cool.

0nvBrRcJuR9jiWyS6IkBtQ.text: We were starving and it was near where we were so decided to stop.  Food was okay but people don't really go to Hooters for the money.  I had the Pulled Pork BBQ sandwich.  I wish it had been on a regular bun rather than the ciabatta bun it was on.  We enjoyed playing the Buzztime Trivia game they had on and our server did a good job even in training so overall, not too bad.

CCmKXGuNXPeshbSmC4-A7A.text: Went for lunch and crowd was very light. Placed order of wings, shrimp, fries and 2 soda's. Jasmine was our server. First thing these ladies should take note on, when a gentleman has a lady with him, don't acknowledge the lady last. You wouldn't like that treatment if the shoes were on the other foot. Our food came and wings were extremely hot (his), shrimp (mine) were cold and she had to return to the kitchen for the fries. They were cold too. Never checked on us again. Finally, as the crowd grew, I asked a server to get the attention of our server and to our unknowingly she was our server. Explain the food is cold and would take it to go now. Final comment she makes is she will stay at the kitchen til the food Is ready like she did the last time. No you didn't or my shrimp and fries would have been HOT as the Chicken. Passive Aggressive. Don't try it.   6/24: Thanks for the update and I will let you know in advance the next time we plan a trip there.

DcaXD8qdCruTF082Nis4HQ.text: Hello friends,   (Updated review) I've been to other Hooters, but while there I always compare them to this location. While they all are suppose to be the same. Ehhhhh, well maybe. But this is my favorite.   The ladies are nice, pretty, and cheerful (considering all the guys that must come in trying to run lame game). I always sit at the bar to the right coming in. When I come with the wife we sit at the bar, booths, or tables. When not sitting at the bar I find at times they are a little tardy at taking your order.   As for the food, I've never had any complaints. LEMON PEPPER is my favorite. Naked = Not breaded. I've had their oysters, salads, wings,  fries (curly, which are my favorite), shrimp. Never trusted them with burgers. But some reviews swear by them.    They have a lot of specials, and a updated lunch menu. They run buy 10,get 10 sometimes. All the PPV fights, MMA etc., are at no cover. Can't beat that.   Go Enjoy, TTFN

eQF2V9r4aZ7a-rZvRDft4Q.text: The food is unusually good here. I went reminesant of times when I was here more frequently in my earlier years and didn't expect the food to be close to as good as what it was. They've updated their menus and the girls aren't in such skimpy clothes any more. The service was slow. Our server should have checked on more often as we had to get the attention of others to help us with utensils. My crab legs came out cold but was taken back and heated up. Food is good but service can be improved.

WWFuKkxvwSYrmA6LM3YFIw.text: Good service here.   The new smoked wings are beyond great!  Still crave them everyday..

lrgOcGTAo55Renfpb57_kg.text: Smaller area compared to the other Hooters. But has a good bunch of friendly girls serving. The tater tots n cheese stuffed pretzels are a must with a drink! Overall a good place to hangout!

Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States

R_8nLbAGIAUzKT_UpqseXg.text: It's a crap shoot at this location. Always short staffed. IF the right cook is in the kitchen your food will be prepared right. And whatever you do, DO NOT allow Mya to be your server. She's horrible. No clue what customer service means. I'm watching all these other servers on their A Game, but Mya needs to be trained better.

pKFEuo-1daI6IUk8Nr_iEw.text: First off I would like to say I never complain due to the fact that I've managed restaurants before so I understand being short staffed or even having an unexpected "rush" of customers all at once. My family and I (husband and 2 kids) were seated very promptly which was to be expected because the restaurant was not full and plenty of tables were available. After waiting it took about 10 mins for the waitress to stop at our table to take our drink order. After getting our drinks it took her another 15-20 mins for her to come and take our food order. The next part had to be the most painful. We literally waited 45 mins for our food to come to our table and once it did we received 1 kids meal which the fries were extremely cold and inedible. We also received part of my husbands meal at that time. 15 more minuets go by and the rest of our meal arrives. During this dreadful time a manager did not stop at our table to see how we were doing nor did our waitress explain what was going on or even offer an apology. I've never experienced something like this. This was extremely frustrating and my kids were upset due to the fact that they had to wait an extremely long time to eat. I just wanted bring this to someone's attention. I'm not sure if this is how this establishment runs every Saturday evening !

-Oav0UjYcLYCLx-wjp5tMA.text: We went for lunch. Place was almost empty. We were seated and our server took our order. We waited over 30 minutes after our order was taken and our server never even came by our table to check on us. Never got our food. Service was terrible.

a0r_2l3sEeMpXVkA6gqGuA.text: Wish I could give no stars. Seat yourself so we sat ourselves on the bar side in a booth. Waited and waited and was never greeted. Husband finally ask the bartender where a server was and she seemed like she didn't want to take care of us so she says something to a manager. A short female African American manager approaches us and states there is no server on that side so sit on the other side or at the bar and rudely walks away. No thanks. If it's not seat yourself, clearly get a hostess . Will never return. A call to corporate is needed!

YhJf50IKs-t0ZrT7JfxB_A.text: I took my friend out to lunch at Hooters of South Charlotte since he's never stepped foot inside any Hooters. It's sort of like that classic Madonna song: "Like A Virgin, touched for the very first time" This was his very first time being exposed to Hooters.  I've been to Hooters many times when there were several locations throughout Upstate NY and Northern New England (mid 1990s to mid 2000s). This is where I chilled out with my old buddies and we really enjoyed the great tasting wings and things and the crazy hula hoop dances on our birthdays.  Fast forward to 2010! We arrived at Hooters of South Charlotte around high noon on a Friday and the parking lot around the restaurant was almost full, pretty busy. This Hooters has an open and loud sports bar atmosphere with several TVs and plenty of sports/beer related decorations throughout the place. Free wi-fi is offered here. We were seated immediately and my friend could hardly contain his excitement of being inside a Hooters for the first time. For myself, this was merely a reunion with Hooters since all 3 NH locations near my home closed down a few years ago.  Our attractive and friendly waitress promptly arrived at our table to take our drink orders, 2 big Diet Pepsis ($2.49 each) and she suggested we try the Fried Pickles ($4.99), which I said,"Sure thing!" The Fried Pickles did not disappoint and tasted pretty good, which were very thin sliced dill pickle chips coated in a crispy breading (not greasy) and served with a creamy and spicy dip.   For lunch, my friend had the Hooters Cobb Salad ($8.99), which was a good sized, "more than a mouthful" salad with a mixture of chopped lettuce, bacon, cheese, eggs, tomatoes, fried chicken pieces and dressing cups on the side. I had the 10 Piece Boneless Wings ($7.99) - Samurai (Teriyaki Style), which had a pretty good sweet taste, but were very small chicken nuggets (thick breading) for the price. I was already full from munching down the fried pickles.  The service was very friendly and attentive. The food arrived within 15 minutes and we were given refills on the Diet Pepsi. Overall, we had a pretty decent lunch with a great view. After lunch, I did offer to buy my friend a black Hooters South Charlotte tee as a souvenir, but this location did not have his shirt size Large (L) in stock. There were plenty of XL and 3XL sizes in stock for the big guys.

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States

qjLWgwaguDY5WU58W_VQBQ.text: Disappointed in the quality of wings. Not much sauce and very very dry. Highly doubt I will be returning!

UCkfdHVNoUenWZgJ2Cogsg.text: I have been a Hooters fan since I was a young buck, so I have visited many throughout the country. I must say that this one in Charlotte is by far one of my most favorite. The service, food and environment are awesome.

LIPjG_FnP6sximWWB2_Jrg.text: Those new smokehouse wings are great!! I loved the food! Loved the service! The prices are still really good! Such a great atmosphere! I feel like I should eat there every day on my lunch break! The food and atmosphere just makes you want to come back for more

Y8NVn8k_QCijBnYHFUZrgw.text: I have been to numerous Hooters over the years. Been happy with the consistency of food in both Canada and U.S. Not so in South Charlotte North Carolina near Pineville NC. Ordered boneless wings with a dry rub. Previous orders in Canada and U.S. were a really good size, kinda like chicken fingers. Ordered here, I received 10 tiny nuggets, each smaller than a quarter. Disappointing. Oh but hey to be fair, they did give me 2 slices of celery; each about the size of an apple stem.

1PRZQN67hMYL5zBSWFrlWw.text: The red head bartender Kelli was great!  The kitchen WOW they took forever.  Was end of lunch time and Mexico FIFA soccer game was on but don't see why so long.  Will come back though! Hooters makes you happy!

SJuyMxqLW9yrEg0uSdkbMw.text: It has been a while since I last stepped into a Hooters or even this location.  It was kind of dead on a Thursday evening, but I have never actually seen this location really busy in the past either.  Anyway, the menu has changed since last time and they offer more selections than before, a good change.  There is now 15 wing sauces to choose from and a wider selection of burger types, salads, and side dishes (like onion rings).  I ordered 20 boneless wings in hot sauce with fries.  The boneless wings were larger than expected, crispy and moist.  The fries, on the other-hand, were okay but needed to be cooked more, half were still soft.  My dad, and the reason we went there, ordered regular wings with no sauce and fries.  His wings are much larger than what they served in years past and were also very good; he didn't eat his fries though because they were not cooked enough (which he did request to be crispy).  Overall, it was a good experience, a definite improvement from past experiences.  However, the prices are still higher than most typical wing places, and there are several good choices nearby that can beat Hooters in both taste and price.

XOWDHfg2H64nzjujCuiTww.text: after waiting 40 minutes on our order we gave up and went to Chick-fil-A across the street. Don't waste your time or money on this place..

7thaByjlrSQi_CaGaZafsA.text: The waitress name Chelsea is so kind, sweet and honest! Lost a pretty good bit of cash there from the previous late night dinner and called the next morning to check and she found it and returned every single dollar. Apparently my two year old was messing around and started stuffing money under the booth cushions and she honestly and kindly returned it. That itself deserve more than a five star. Of course I tip her well for finding it.

4fMcY1chJmR1Ku3_iNy0IA.text: Sorry folks the service here in my experience has been just awful.  Sounds like others have had other better experiences but from going here about 5 times I can see it's not an isolated incident.  Bottomline- if you come in with a big group they'll give you the attention you deserve but if you come in solo or just with one other person you'll be disappointed.  Latest experience was coming in on a day they were doing a big nationwide promotion.  I had to actually educate on server that the promotion was going on.  Wings took over a half hour.  Kitchen looked short staffed- which hey it happens, people call out etc.  But the waitress must have passed our table at least a dozen times but no acknowledgement that we existed, asking if we wanted more drinks, update on when our food was coming out etc.  Sure you're busy with other tables but you still have to give everyone you're serving the time of day.  I know the Hooters brand prides itself on having its waitresses provide a certain kind of experience.  I could care less about that and would settle for meeting the basic standards for hospitality. Never had any complaints about the food.  Hooters still does a good wing.  Wish all my tips could go straight to the hard working people in the kitchen.  They're the real superstars of this place. My advice if you're thinking of going here for football seasons- get your order to go!  With the money you'll save on beer and tips you can spring for the Sunday ticket on your own.

yEIJq2v6DrAyS5wW8CtmDg.text: I really don't know why I keep going back here. The service was pretty bad this time around and the food was worse. I ordered steak quesadillas and they were filled with steakum! Wtf? THe only thing that Hooters can make edible is their Buffalo Shrimp. Carolina Pavilion desperately needs another sit down restaurant.

13EPGrNfNZq053bCFSZVmg.text: Staff: Samorah was our waiter and what a jewel! She was friendly, courteous and prompt. She made us feel welcomed and somehow was always a head nod away. Better locations for Hooters as the other locations that are near us don't really do a great job of preparing or cooking the wings this place every time we go we are never a disappointment wings come out fresh hot juicy and taste great. I recommend this place to anyone looking for a great wings atmosphere is always nice and cozy and the upkeep is always great bathrooms look good as well and the wait staff is always nice.

H70lKV9ZAXH9e6CGw1AvPQ.text: If I could give zero stars I would. This place should not even be in business. This was by far the worst restaurant experience that I have ever had. If you truly want to know just how bad this restaurant is, just copy and paste the link, it is to a google drive document that explains everything. docs.google.com/document...

pKldmKwq6Lm8dj3TMFZCxw.text: Came late in the afternoon so it wasn't busy. The service was on the slow side but the waitress was really nice. The food was great. We had the shrimp, tots, garlic parmesan garlic and spicy garlic.

JMmyqPU3gXTiZEtID-Bb4g.text: This was one of the WORST experiences I ever had. First it took them forever to take my order, secondly my food was to go and they put it as dine-in and messed up my order. The waitress did not even apologize for the mistake or inform me that they had to correct my order. I had to ask her was that my food and she said yes but did not tell me st all. So usually for the inconvenience restaurants would at least apologize or something but no they still charged me the full price. Lastly I get the correct food and I ask for my dipping sauce since I have wings the waitress who name is Mercedes said it's in the bag mind you we both checked the food together and there was no dipping sauce in the take out box or bag so I had to wait for that also. PLEASE DO NOT EVER GO TO THIS HOOTERS!!!

ibfdNdZD0oZKsDbROC7kNQ.text: Ordered through DoorDash and this location screwed up my entire order. We ordered "original wings" mild. That means breaded and tossed in sauce. They came naked and with very little sauce. The sliders I ordered for my son off the kids menu was requested plain, just meat and bread. They came with cheese and the appetizer sliders were requested with bacon and you guessed it, no bacon.   For a meal that cost over $60 it should have been correct. Who's checking orders at Hooters? I assume no one.

V6TqxgnSlEIKOfAiUWfu9A.text: Ordered through Postmates .... called store to ask for blue cheese and ranch to be added to my order to dip wings.  Wings delivered, no dressings delivered.  For 17 bucks ++, we could have ordered McKoys

7mSYBfRj--0zJm_GtF9vgg.text: As I literally sit inside of hooters, it's now 9:57pm. Food served cold even though my side dishes was served in cast iron side dishes so I thought. Literally my waitress is trash and understand I'm a restaurant AGM do I know the stress of the restaurant business but when it's damn near dead in here and my food sat back there cause my idiot waitress didn't bring it out is unexceptable to me. Also my bf had blackened fish tacos but the cook proceeded to make Mahi sandwich. Like can anyone write the correct ticket and can anyone cook the correct hot food. The waitress proceeds to brush me off not realizing that at the end of the day you chose to except the position so do your job and to the managers so helpful advise from restaurant manager to another. Do your job and manage and stop sitting on your behind waitress name is Alexia and she has the nastiest attitude but I'm the right customer. Re train or put in the kitchen away from customers.

auurJTC8BFkznYoqbdQAOA.text: Ladies were nice but terrible service. There were about 20 of them gawking around with an empty restaurant yet i still had to wait extremely long for service.  I try to be kind with reviews, but frankly I would not come here.  There was also weird hair in my food.

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States. Hair in my salad I put it on the side of the plate

fJCNC7490Euj7b4i0WR0gQ.text: Waited for 15 minutes and never got waited on. The place was dead. No excuse. No drinks, no food. I could understand if they were busy, but again, they were completely dead.

0PjPUUmR8I5wt79SGIt9zQ.text: Not the best service! I ordered shrimp and about 5 mins after the waitress put the order in came back and said they had to prep the chicken! Lol umm I had the shrimp! Then food came just sat it down didn't ask if we needed anything else and NEVER came back to check on us! BUT was quick to get our card to pay though! Lol I'll just say her tip wasn't much!

J66PRZ8VcO8eEpRAB9aVrA.text: We visited here yesterday my friend ordered 10 wings , one which looked nothing like a wing !! I swear I seen the beak !! But even if wasn't we asked waitress to take back and ask she came back said it was just a real meaty wing ?? So my friend picks off a feather and said Is this a feather she said yes! So she took back manager came out and said well you know it's a kitchen there will be feathers , said sorry , so my friend says well can I have some more she said oh you want the rest the wings back ?? He said well well yea if that's my only option , she brings back rest of wings and said here ya go sorry . Didn't say anything didn't even discount the wings !! Not even the feathered one !!!

-Qjno0j5Jz_7d5P1OCWAqQ.text: Food was good. Got a surprisingly fast service, from ordering to getting the food to the table. Waitress was attentive. 2 comments:  first, server moved too fast .. before finishing the order she was gone and I had to call her back. ( twice ) 2nd, the floor and place isn't that clean. When you sit to eat and the table next to you been cleaned by wiping whatever on top to the floor it's not that pleasant, especially since its stayed like that after I was done and leaving

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States. Taco salad

7KUCVz85B41l_9DhEQb9KA.text: First time going to this Hooters and will never be back.. first they were out of lemons, cool, then we went to order and I wanted bbq and they said they were out of bbq sauce LOL me and my boyfriend both order boneless wings (which I've gotten at other hooters and they were reasonably sized) and we get them and they are literally like kid chicken nuggets LOL again. BARELY had any sauce and were so dry. What a joke. Our chicken nachos had maybe 4 pieces of chicken on it and was basically all chips. For a 60$ tab DEFF not worth it ! When asked why they were out of everything her response was "we're getting ready to close soon" LOL didn't know 3 hours was "soon"

X4l9RJLu5NXEhfp16kxOSQ.text: I really want to come back to try more of their menu. Sampled some wings (smoked/Daytona) and their big fat fries. I preferred the taste of the Daytona wings better, but definitely appreciated the charred crispness of the smoked wings. The fried were too heavily salted so next time I would request that they hold the salt. The cheese that they offer for an additional .99 cents, I thought it was going to be more of a regular cheddar cheese sauce but it's actually nacho cheese sauce. Sweet tea was good, the staff was friendly, my server Kayla was very attentive.

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States. Daytona wings (L) Smoked wings (R)
Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States. Fries with side of cheese
Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States

03WOIt3a3h_LfJtNtgsQYw.text: Do not patronize Hooters. It has fallen completely off. It is no longer an entertaining venue. It's chefs act as if they cannot follow simple instructions. They cannot tell the difference between "toss lightly" and "drizzle" nor can they tell the difference between "normal breading" and "double breading". It's wait staff no longer understands the connection between light flirting and good customer service. There no longer seems to be any desire to make the Hooters experience an enjoyable, fun one. I guess the article in the Business Weekly is right: Hooters as we knew it is dead. Today's Hooters is a mere shell of what it once was. And honestly, it should be put out of its misery just as farmers do with old cows that no longer can produce either milk or calves and aren't suitable for selling beef.

ICkCDutwueLnx12Kc-I9FA.text: Kinda nice that you can get something to eat AND hook ups with one of the girls that'll send you sexy pics and even topless videos from their gig at The Men's Club! Bonus!

phXT2y0Jvtdr3r2Xj9fQKw.text: I give this restaurant 2.5 stars. This was my first time going to hooters. I came in with my boyfriend and his best friend. During the entire 4 hours we were there, the waitress constantly kept giving refills to my boyfriend and his friend, but did not give me a refill. I was offended because I felt like they were being very disrespectful. I don't know if they were trying to be more flirtatious or thought that they was going to get a better tip from the guys. But I think it's wrong that the entire time I was drinking from the same drink. Only reason I was able to get a refill is because my boyfriend gave me his. Shortly after he gave me his, the waitress gave him another. I would not be coming back here again. The food was alright, but I will say I like the fact that it wasn't too crowded.

RkKbrgiv77AAUiUbD5JFlw.text: Such bad service here. Stopped by for a beer after work. It was around 6 pm on a Wednesday. Sat at the bar. Bar had 8-10 customers. I sat there for 5 min before anyone acknowledged my existence. Once they did I ordered a beer. Even though I am 50 the girl had to check my ID. Seriously Hooters, can you just train your employees to use common since when asking fo an ID. A blanket policy that you check all ID's is you being lazy in your training program. Well the girl that took my order proceeded to the place she enters orders, tapped a few times on the screen than decided to have a conversation with another girl standing there. After the 3-4 minute conversation she came over to the guy next to me and took his dinner order. Again she went over to the screen to do her tapping. By this point I had been sitting at the bar around 15 min and still did not have a beer. I got up and left. Don't waste your time or money here.

6z_rIdIFY2QruuTfRW6PtA.text: Kelli is the absolute best bartender! She's always happy and brings energy whenever she is working.

OFaH6GhmFOcsOaFbAup8fg.text: Let me start by saying the restaurant is a nice one   I'm just getting off of work from a 3-11 shift wanted to wind down with my normal Long Island so I placed the order. About ten minutes later the waitress comes and tells me that they don't have one of the liquors for the drink and to choose another so I did. And of course ten minutes later again I was told they didn't have the certain liquor there as well. Family of four and my brothers wings weren't correct as well as my sisters sandwich not be accurate either. Yes I understand you may close at 1:00am but there is no need to slack towards the ending of the shift only giving two stars because the food was ok once everyone got situated. Nice place nice environment but have to get better with communication with your guests.

T6TuP7TnsUWk9zzqLjCu6A.text: We had a Great time! My visiting parents, my kids and I stepped in for lunch and for being soccer fans we wanted to watch the Women's FIFA World Cup. Courtney was absolutely amazing! We got spoiled getting the channels changed to watch the game, food was delicious. The only tiny negative is that the kids meal had a very spicy barbecue sauce and my boys don't really eat spicy - we weren't counting on the sauce being too spicy for them. Apart from that Awesome!

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States. Menu

9DboEotjBXrkEq5bNDF2yw.text: After two bad visits to the Charlotte downtown Hooters, I thought I would visit this location hoping for a better experience.  Well, it didn't work out any better.  The service was okay, but the girls at this location have the same low level of enthusiasm as the downtown one. The worst part was the food.  I ordered a side of onion rings.  Half of them were cold.  All of them were DRIPPING with grease and tasted bad.  The wings were similar.  They had a greasy texture to them. I don't know why the Hooters in Charlotte have gone downhill like they have.  While I hope they get their act together and bring them back to what Hooters used to be, I won't hold my breath.  I am planning on visiting the Concord / Speedway Blvd. location to see if they have tanked like these two locations.  For now, avoid them.

5kv721fZjx7AMq7Qe2E04Q.text: My husband is a craft beer enthusiast and he ordered a local IPA he frequently enjoys:  NoDa Brewery's Hop Drop & Roll. The first beer they brought him was correct, but when they brought the second beer out, it was clearly a Miller Lite. The server told us the bartender accidentally poured the wrong beer the first time, but THIS was the correct beer. My husband told her no, the first one was correct, this one is not. But not wishing to be an inconvenience, he took the Miller Lite and drank it anyway. When he finished it, he went straight to the bartender for his next drink as he wanted to interact with her personally and ensure he got the beer he wanted.   After first refusing to serve him -- apparently if you have a waitress you can't order at the bar? -- the bartender insisted she poured the incorrect beer the first time, and the second beer she sent out was the correct one (the Hop Drop). My husband drinks this beer all the time, and he knows the difference between that and a domestic light beer. He tried explaining this, but she refused to hear it and continued to argue with him that he was the one mistaken, not her. When he pointed out that the beer she was trying to give him wasn't even the right color, she changed her tune, saying "Oh, we only carry the light Hop Drop, not the regular."  We are big enthusiasts of the brewery that produces this beer -- they do not make a "light" Hop Drop IPA.  He was absolutely 100% certain he was being served Miller Lite (he also drinks this beer regularly so he knows what he's talking about).  At one point, our server said she would go talk with the manager to straighten it out and see if perhaps something was wrong with the taps, or if there was an issue on the bartender's end. As soon as she left our table, she went and sat at a table with a bunch of other waitresses and never went to get the manager. My husband attempted to get her attention a few times, and his attempts were ignored.   To add insult to injury, we were still charged for two Hop Drop IPAs, which are quite a bit more expensive than a regular domestic.  Even after the bartender claimed she served us a $5 beer the first time, we were still charged for two $8 beers.   It seems insignificant, not really a big deal, but after a very long day at work we were looking forward to hanging out and enjoying a few good beers.  We can't figure out what the big issue was with this particular beer. And in general, it's poor form to argue with a customer when you're in the wrong.  If a customer is insisting you're giving them the wrong product, even if you think you're right, shouldn't you check into it and see if a tap might be hooked up to the wrong keg or something?  Just my thoughts. We won't be returning to this Hooters again regardless.  The food tasted fine but I can find good food at plenty of other places with better service.

fax4DeFZTok15cqLbXIfUQ.text: Ubereats delivery this evening and we got two boxes of wings. They were supposed to be one mild and one medium, both of them the regular wings. We ended up with one medium regular and one medium breaded, which is not a major problem.  Packed nicely, a good mix of wings and legs, they had the little pot of blue  cheese. Tasty and greasy like wings are supposed to be. Decent flavor and enjoyable. An A-OK experience from Hooters.  [Review 10476 overall, 243 of 2019.]

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States. Wings deliver from Hooters

SMuQM3gI3mVtIU-_6bxI-g.text: Not too many bad things I can say about Hooters I mean it's Hooters!!! Their wings are always good and they have amazing drinks. Kinda wish they would upgrade this location, looks drab and dark...dated. Also tables need to be cleaned soon as folks leave. A lot of the girls are just sitting around instead of sprucing up. Idk maybe that's not in their job description but someone needs to make sure it is. Anyway my server Jade was great, very polite, funny and friendly.

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States. Curlies and Wings
Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States. Menu...I ordered a Tropical Long Island(didn&#39;t take pic). Was good

O4wwVWr_nCxqwAZa0XsWWw.text: Ordered through Grubhub. Delivery was fine. As for my order? Not so much.   I ordered 10 piece chicken wings wrapped in bacon that was supposed to be in teriyaki sauce on it with blue cheese on the side.   I received 10 dry wings wrapped in bacon. A side of celery. No teriyaki sauce and no blue cheese.   This would have to be my absolute last resort to ever order from this Hooters ever again.

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States

eV5tDKJbWh3cGdJ_9PS9xQ.text: It's Hooters, a sports bar. Little on the dirty disorganized looking side. Service is fine, the server was attentive and checked in often. This location however, believes Pico De Gallo is diced tomatoes covered in cabbage with carrot slivers. I was incredibly disappointed in the buffalo chicken tacos because of this. Other locations seem to get the tacos right, not sure what's up here.

SOWDPZDRukkRla4aUzK9Jw.text: So I must say I'm not big on hooters. Just average bar food with a great concept. Today however, I had no choice because I was going to the movies and there are absolutely no food options in this area... Well there a couple (Chik Fila A, Popeye's) but none of them have drinks so Hooters was the victor!  I'm all about craft beer and they had a great Indian pale ale (only one on the menu, try it!). After that I got the strawberry margarita. I have to say that I was pleasantly surprised. It was amazing. I'll definitely get that drink again.  I was only there for drinks but I can always go for some fried pickles. That was the gateway to the thing that changed my life...Garlic Habanero smoked wings! Wowsers! I love trying unique Wing flavors and that's definitely one I hadn't seen before. It was so good that hotters has now officially made it my 2018 NFL Sunday football restaurants. Gotta come back for those.

r2PjsTqzGuMchNn1M1qRfg.text: Every Hooters you go to will be very different in service, and with how the food tastes so try several to get a general idea of what Hooters has to offer.  On this day my family and I went to the South Boulevard location for a good meal.  I was in the mood for comfort food and ordered a plate of the Chili Cheese Fries, a side of Broccoli with a Sweet Tea.    Location: Easily accessible and there was a parking spot for us although it was a busy night.  When we walked in we were seated right away and noticed most tables were full.  Service: LaLa came out greeted us and took our order.  She was nice and attentive making sure that she heard all of the special ways each person wanted their food.  LaLa did her best to get everything right which takes time.  Food: My food was served hot and was seasoned well.  I very much enjoyed the Chili Cheese Fries and the Sweet Tea.  The broccoli however was to-die-for AMAZING.  Now you wonder how that is possible. . . well it was washed clean, with no sandy grit and it was cooked properly.  It was soft and buttery and flavorful.  I will get the side of broccoli every time that I go.    We were given just the right amount of time to eat and did not feel rushed.  I went to the women's rest room and noticed that it could use a makeover.  It is not the worst I have seen but it also is not the best.  I would use the restroom again but would hope that it gets a little more love and care this year.

IdjscECFIQrYcd2J9Zn5rQ.text: This location is in desperate, desperate, desperate need of a remodel! I had heard a one point they were going to, but nothing as of yet. The exterior is worn and dated. The interior is dark, dirty, dingy, disgusting, sticky, filthy. The men's restroom is so disgusting is almost makes me want to hold my bladder! Maybe TMI but, it's a True statement.  I like some of the management, but a disgusting facility is a disguting facility. Maybe it's time for a Hooters corporate management intervention! If you don't put money in to a facility, why should patrons car about supporting your business?

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States

2H2r5T-PLLNs6BG9c1iNqg.text: My friend and I usually love to go to Hooters to order their steamed shrimp and steamed oysters. We did not know Hooters only serves raw oysters now( not their problem). That was solely a mistake we made. We ordered a Buffalo Chicken Salad to split and when it arrived, we could tell the chicken was light in color. Something told us to split up the chicken before we took a bite and all the pieces were raw in the middle. The manager never came over to apologize for inconvenience! Please kitchen crew make sure your chicken is cooked all the way before sending it out.

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chicken undercooked
Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States. Buffalo Chicken Salad

Lc_h8_dKUSP9fRKYQWzB3Q.text: Very please with time and the person who brought the food out was very nice but the only down fall is I received the wrong food, just a little disappointed on that part. Could have been a driver error

HF0QHwZtJzEgb90WA3AhIA.text: I went to this Hooters after I saw a movie in a nearby theater. It was the only place open after 10!   They have 1/2 half appetizers after 10 pm! PLUS!  I ordered sliders you 4 sliders and curly fries for $5.61 you can mix and match your sliders which was also a plus! We also ordered 12 Buffalo fried shrimp! It was also $5.61 because it came off the appetizer menu  Our server was pleasant but wasn't too sure of substitution options for food or drinks.   It was late night and most of the waitresses were congregated around the food server area waiting for orders! I noticed they were fixing their hair and making uniform adjustments right by the food pick up area! I want to give this a 4 but I don't like unsanitary environments

8NBErBgVKYSn-ubA8SN0LA.text: Amazing service and food even when it was busy. Very happy with my experience will be coming back soon!

3C5uOX8cifB0DkLYA42Yzg.text: Odered food to go and I must say I'm so disappointed. The fries were undercooked and hard   Bones less wings were dry and barely had any sauce on it.

RGqNZRb55J9Bp2aVqG_u7g.text: Apparently you must show ID for a prepaid pick up order.    I was told folks pick up other people orders. As for the wings: extra crispy extra wet was visibly missing sauce.  There's only 10 wings to the order so extra sauce shouldn't be hard but apparently 1 blue cheese is enough for 10 wings.   I can't recommend due to the license issue as they wrote my license number down on some homemade paper.

5T_UQmxIy7caZgWur-ARWQ.text: There aren't that many food options in this area, so this is your best choice, I would say..  The service has always been fantastic!! The food is usually good (considering it's Hooters). The charred wings are the best option. My biggest suggestion would be to avoid the grilled chicken sandwiches or anything similar like that.. The texture of the chicken is very questionable.. that's really my only gripe... the food *can* be hit or miss, but it's usually decent.

UfZzP4ubsTwlD0jRvGh1cg.text: We sat at the bar and do everytime my boyfriend and I visit. The bar staff was super friendly and accommodating, remembering us from previous visits. The late night food was on POINT and Im leaving a happy guest. Thanks Hooters!

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States

OlAeVf2fG22uJRyMGLPDwA.text: I sat at the bar to eat and the bartender was pretty attentive so the service was good. Inside the restaurant looked a bit dated as it was a bit dark. I ordered 10 naked wings (half Three Mile Island and half  Triple Dog) which were cooked thoroughly but not nearly crispy enough. Next time I will order them extra crispy. They said the Triple Dog sauce is really hot but it wasn't for me. Then again I eat spicy food often.

aj1bb9fuXJtzElTzyNd_NQ.text: Normally the food at hooters is really good, but today it was not. We started with cheese sticks that are some of the best around. My husband had the sliders and his burgers were overdone and his chicken was not portioned the same. The fries were very dry. I had the parmesan garlic wings and they were really good. The service was really good too. Football wise, they had every game on and we did not have trouble finding the games we were interested in.

photos.caption: Photo of Hooters - Charlotte, NC, United States
